page.title: 02Markyate Boys Football Club
page.content: {MARKYATE WEST END BOYS' FOOTBALL CLUB In Markyate there is a football club. It is run by a parent in the village. In the winter we play every Sunday. There are teams for under 8:10:12&14. It is very well oganised.There are 70 or more boys.We have five different kits one's blue and white striped with blue shorts and another is all red another is claret top and blue shorts another is blue top and blue shorts and the last one is blue top and claret shorts.The first and most important trophy presented each year since 1979 is the Club "Man-of-the- Year".The club has been going for eight successful years.In the summer there is training on Sundays and Wednesdays.We play in the Hemel Hempstead Minors League.In 1984/85 the under 12's got into a quarter final and a semi-final.
